review: Very good suggestion and  treatment very soft hand for doing dental treatment no waiting timing very much efficient doctor

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review:
I found Dr Pooja very professional and expert in her job. I was told that the time she will spend on my tooth will be longer. Within minutes the job was done and I said wow. It was pleasant surprise that she very efficiently and confidently carried the task. 
I found her very helpful and explained the process well. She is very talented young woman. Well done Puja. I am very proud of you. Thanks for the treatment. I will recommend my friends and others to you. Keep the good work.

****** ** **** **** **** *** ********
I consulted her for puling my wisdom tooth.
I was told by other doctors that it would be a complex surgery since it can not be pulled straight. I also have fobia about blood and medical equipments.
Doctor Pooja handled me so well and did the job very very skillfully without any issues.

Thank you so much doctor

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: It was really good. Doctor was very friendly, kind and patient. I got my wisdom tooth removed from both sides today. It's not painful at all. Even after the effect of anesthesia is gone it's not paining. Stitches are stiched well. That's all i have to share as my experience. I'm satisfied with the decision of choosing this clinic and the results!!

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Post surgery she ensured I knew what protocols to follow and did update me how would I feel. Highly recommended
